Title: 39939 - # Ways to Eliminate Account Access Vulnerability Among Remote Employees
Direction: 500 words. The work-at-home ranks keep growing every year with more people working remotely. But they still need access to the company servers and software in order to do their jobs. Both scenarios create vulnerabilities in the form of hackers stealing account information as it gets entered or transmitted over unsecure Wi-Fi access points. Direction: 500 words. HIPAA, or the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act, requires that patient information be stored as securely as possible. As a result, cloud storage companies have created different types of security measures. List 3-6 different measures that legal and medical offices could take to protect their information stored in the cloud, while still complying with federal rules.
